You can't hear the trains pulling their famous horns so I imagine your sleep is more guaranteed here than closer to the beach. The Pier gives you the instant holiday spirit so don't wait to visit it! The hotel is also located near restaurants, fastfood, Starbucks around the corner and Ralphs is only two blocks away. We didn't experience the extra friendly check-in like so many stated here, but it all went smooth. Next day we asked for another room (since ours was right above the

I'm way overdue for a review with this hotel. In all of my experiences, the staff is second to none. I've went as far as leaving an envelope with $200 and a spare room key for a friend of mine at the front desk, and had no second thoughts about it. They always find a way to accommodate for last minute changes and special request if possible. Cameron in particular goes far beyond the call of duty. Any request I throw his way he was able to answer with professionalism and adds his own personal flair. Bottom line if you communicate with the staff and give them heads up on events, they are more than willing to work with you to ensure your stay is more than satisfactory. As far as the the hotel the location is great, you can walk to any location of importance in San Clemente. The

We always stay here when in town. The rooms are clean and surprisingly quite. The staff was awesome from check in to check out. The location is fantastic, walking distance to everything. The restaurant staff was great and very accommodating. Can't wait for my next stay.

This is our second stay at this motel and it was wonderful both times!  The hotel staff is especially friendly and go above and beyond in customer service.  The rooms are nice and spacious and the a good value for the money spent.

Wow I highly recommend this hotel. From the moment we walked into the door they provided outstanding customer service each day. We arrived earlier than the 3pm check in time and they were able to have us into a room immediately. We had a great ocean-room view from our hotel balcony. The beds were comfy. The bathroom was spacious. I barely had any complaints. As for the breakfast cafe inside the hotel, I recommend the blueberry pancakes! Everything else tasted mediocre. Shane at the front desk was very polite and friendly. The entire staff were phenomenal. If I ever visit San clemente again I'll definitely return to this hotel! I truly enjoyed my stay here.

I'll start off by saying that I gave this property a 4 based on the quality of the rooms, the lobby, and the hotel entrance.They are all very nice, but the pool area was not. Thankfully, that was not important to us. We were with another couple and both of our rooms were very much to our liking, clean and comfortable. We had 2 queens with a choice of pillows, and extremely comfy bedding, an important factor for us as we are not usually good sleepers. Our room was on the "ocean view" side, we thank the staff very much for that! We did not eat breakfast there, preferring to walk to a different spot each morning. This hotel is within walking distance to a lot of places for shopping and eating, but if you want to walk to the ocean, be ready for a long uphill climb back! Off street

We moved away from San Clemente a year ago and have been back to visit friends many times. We always stay at this location. It is convenient to everything in town and easy for my teenager to visit friends without needing a ride. The staff is excellent from check in to check out and help to resolve any issues quickly. It is our so cal home away from home.

Everyone was so friendly and so nice. The gentleman at the front desk for the night shift gave me an upgrade and I was able to have a beautiful view of the ocean!!! I most definitly will come back to stay on my next vacation

Summary Heading: Always looking forward to returning to this hotel!
Summary: Troy the manager always remembers his guests names and makes everyone feel welcome. The entire staff extend themselves to the needs of the guests. The location is perfect, rooms always clean, great breakfast and great price point. I stay alone and never feel alone. Better than any local B&B 3x the price!

The facilites and staff, were wonderful in a great locati.on.  Convenient to walk San Clemente.  I arrived early, and the staff got me my room ahead of the check in time.  They were knowledgable about the area, friendly and helpful.  I would book here before bothering anywhere else.

Thank you to Todd, Shane, Troy and Katie for helping me out with a problem with my reservation. They were pleasant, respectful and shared my frustration. They were able to solve the issue. The back rooms although next to the highway are surprisingly quiet. You can pay more for the front rooms that have an ocean view. The restaurant was reasonably priced for breakfast and the service was fast. The waiter was very nice. Clean rooms and spacious with fridge and microwave.

I was a guest at the Holiday Inn San Clemente for a business trip this year. I was impressed by the efficient, genuinely friendly staff. They went out of their way to meet requests and needs. Breakfast buffet in the morning was delicious. The rooms were more than comfortable, extremely clean with added amenities like a mini fridge, wifi & coffee maker. The ocean-view balcony was my favorite part of the stay. Just a short drive and quick walk from the beach and hub of town with good eats quickly accessible. It was a great stay.

My boyfriend and I were looking around for a beach stay-get-away. We looked up a few places and decided to choose here. The room was great, sliding door with the smell of the ocean and huge plus side, hot tub in the room. We were greeted with our arrival by the Gm Todd. I believe that was his name. I take it as a huge plus when staff take the time to greet you. He gave us helpful suggestions for places to go. Unfortunately, our stay was cut short due to my boyfriend being called into work, but once again greeted by Troy at the front desk checking us out. Thanks Troy for turning such an early morning into a great morning making sure our stay was great! Awesome staff all around! We will be back.

I very much appreciated my stay. The staff was gracious and friendly. The room was outstanding, and the food was delicious. I heartily recommend the hotel to others, and will plan on staying there again!

Summary Heading: I was great place to stay people are very nice
Summary: Very nice place clean rooms nice pool very good costumer service our next trip is gonna be in California and Its gonna be holiday inn! And the manager Is doing his job 100% they take care of their guests and we'll be back soon. Thank u very much we had such a great weekend!

This hotel provided a taste of home as I attended a nearby conference. The room and common spaces were clean and appropriately quiet with an inviting outdoor gathering space and covered parking. Especially appreciated the gracious and helpful staff.

Summary Heading: Wonderful location and view of the ocean.
Summary: We had a room that faced the ocean. Great view and the charming town with restaurants and shops is very convenient. Starbucks is a block away. The walk to the pier is downhill through town. Very fun. The walk from the pier is uphill through town. Not as much fun. Friendly staff made our time great.

The staff of this Holiday Inn provided excellent service for our large group of conference attenders. They offered great insight into the local surroundings and greeting us with professionalism and courtesy. Great stay!

This is a real California experience, if we have to stay in San Clemente on our way to or from San Diego, there is nowhere else! This is a small hotel and you almost feel like visiting friends when you go there. The big boss Todd came to welcome us back and Mr Troy made sure we were getting the room we like. Nothing can be better than having Managers like them who really care about their costumers because that's what bring us back.

Needed a little R and R found the perfect place to stay.  Todd the Manager is a great host.  The staff is very helpful and were able to meet all my needs.  Maid service was excellent and my room was immaculate.  Found lots to do in San Clemente,everywhere was within walking distance of the hotel.  Highly recommend it. Irene B

I highly recommend this place ! Great service and ocean view. Room was in perfect order. Next time I need to stay in downtown san clemente its gonna be at the holiday inn San clemente. Too bad there was not a 6th star I would have gave them a 6 star rating.

San Clemente is a great beach town with some good restaurants, interesting shops and a great walking beach. This Holiday Inn is located close to all of the above. The staff is helpful and pleasant and the maid service is very dependable. You hear a bit of noise from the freeway and there isn't a great outdoor space to sit, but then you have the ocean and beach close by. There is a restaurant in the hotel for breakfast that is ok...but ask for the $2.99 breakfast special for a really good deal.

Great location.  Very close to the downtown business district but far enough away from the traffic congestion.  Front desk services were very helpful and knowledgeable of the local area. Todd, the GM, has assembled a great staff.   Compliments to Austin, Shiela, Cameron and Troy.    This hotel has a full service breakfast available but no evening bar and restaurant.  This does not detract from the ideal location of this hotel.  You are within 5 minutes walking distance to several great local establishments.    We have stayed at this hotel numerous times over the past 10 years and will continue to do so on our trips to San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Convenient location for a stay in San Clemente
Summary: The hotel is near the nice restaurants and shops in a street which you can walk to the beach. It's right next to the exit of the freeway. So is convenient to drive to San Diego or to L.A. Frontdesk is friendly. Check-in/check-out is efficiently fast.   I stayed here twice. Once in a sea view room with regular bath, once in a sea view room with a jacuzzi bathtub. The jacuzzi bathroom has a open plan layout so you can see your bed and balcony when you are in the bathtub. I see other complaints that the room face the freeway. Actually what happen is that there are two types of room: one face sea, one face freeway. So as long as you pay a little more for a room facing sea, you probably won't have any complaint for the hotel.

I would like to say a little something about the staff here at The Holiday Inn San Clemente. Although I am treated like a family member each and every time here, I have never written a review. The rooms are always clean, fresh and always ready when they say they are....most of the time even earlier. I am amazed from the time I get on the phone with them. I feel like they are really excited to see me. Like I said, I feel like I am part of their little family, as they know what I like to do and inform me of special events going on in town, that I may like. Because of this very staff, I have sought out Holiday Inn/ Express and I have truly been satisfied by other branches, but this my home away from home. Thank you so very much for your spirit, smiles and honest

Went with my girlfriend for a quick getaway.  The manager Todd was extremely helpful and suggested a couple of great spots for us to check out on our walk to the pier.  It is easy to forget what a nice little town San Clemente is but with the hotel located right in the heart of town it is easy  to take it in.  Needless to say we had a great stay and the fact that you don't have to deal with crowds associated with the other area beach communities is a huge bonus.

We enjoyed an overnight stay in San Clemente and was welcomed by Shane W. when we arrived.  He was very friendly and helpful and upgraded us to a suite.   We enjoyed the view from our room of the ocean.  The hotel was a little dated, but was in good condition for the age.  The rooms were updated and the beds very comfortable.  We enjoyed the staff and upgrade and would stay again.

The service that my father & I received from Troy Morgan and his staff was outstanding. They were very accommodating to our daily needs. The entire staff at the hotel would pleasantly inform us of the various activities to do around town and in the nearby cities. The hotel and the room were kept very clean. The room is spacious and the beds are very comfortable. San Clemente is a small and peaceful town to relax, enjoy the scenery and to forget about the stressful day to day life that we live. It is a wonderful place to spend with family. The Holiday Inn Hotel and its staff just make the stay more memorable. Thank you!
Manager Response: Gurrola,  Thank you for your review! I am so glad to hear that you and your father had a relaxing time while you were staying with us. As you know, San Clemente is known for it's laid back and relaxing atmosphere. We look forward to your visit in the near future.

Summary Heading: by far the most the best customer service to date
Summary: I will start by saying I was blown away by the great location, but them we were super impressed by the friendly staff.  My friend and had not been to San Clemente before and had no idea where to go for great restaurants or  cocktails.  We were waiting for a can for forever and the friendly front desk receptionist Austin gave us the low down on all the best places to go and he was right on the money about each suggestion.  Then I left some items in my room and Austin made it a point to have the items shipped back to Te as for me.  We had a great trip while staying at this hotel and Austin's customer service made it effortless and worry free.  We will see y'all again.
Manager Response: Jenbears,  Thank you for your great review! I am happy to hear that Austin was such a big help in assisting you in planning your evening. All of us here at Holiday Inn, San Clemente are experts in the local area, especially when it comes to one of the many great restaurants near the hotel. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at this hotel. Very friendly people. Troy was very kind during our stay. Rooms were very clean and we had a wonderful view. We plan on going back and hopefully stay at your place again...
Manager Response: Blanca L,  Thank you for your review! We are glad you chose to stay with us for your family vacation. We know there are a lot options for you and your family and we are proud to be your first choice. We hope to see you and your family on your next beach vacation!

Summary: This is a largely undiscovered piece of heaven. The hotel faces the beautiful blue Pacific ocean and is priced so reasonably for what is offered. The staff is absolutely wonderful. Special thanks to Will the chef and Todd the general manager. I don't think you could ever get more  for your money than staying here.

My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights in April and were pleasantly surprised with the great location. We were able to walk to restaurants and shops on Del Mar Ave. We even made the long walk to the beach. This property is certainly not ocean front, but some of the rooms do offer views of the water. Our room unfortunately faced the I-5 freeway. The room was pretty standard for a Holiday Inn hotel. Not too many upgrades. WiFi worked great though. Parking filled up quickly in the afternoons, but luckily we didn't move our car too much so it wasn't an issue.  Overall it was a nice stay. Perhaps slightly overpriced for what you get, but hotel options in San Clemente are limited.
Manager Response: Dear MegL829,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback regarding your stay with us. It is a delight to read you liked our location and had a nice stay. It is our goal to consistently provide superior service and accommodations at our hotel and your comments are very important to us. We rely on you, our guest, to let us know how we are doing and how we can better meet your needs.  Thank you again for the candid feedback. We look forward to your next visit  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: very good hotel to stay in san clemente. we were in family vacation with our son that surf and we could go to the great shops and restaurant nearby. the location is great and the staff were very helpful. the wi fi is free and without problem . the rooms are large and clean and the bathroom is very large and nice. the parking is free and very large .

Summary Heading: Great location and huge balcony ocean view
Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed in the jacuzzi suite and loved it. We could walk to great restaurants and great shops. The staff were so nice and helpful. Will definitely stay again. We loved sitting on the spacious balcony and could see the ocean and a great restaurant across the street. Loved the architecture of buildings

This property is at Exit 75 directly next to I-5. Rooms facing the freeway I can imagine would be very loud so we requested and were provided a 3rd floor room facing the ocean (15 minutes walk away down Del Mar Ave). The location is great for a daytime or evening stroll down the main streets of San Clemente which features numerous outdoor restaurants.   The room had a great mini frig, coffee maker (4 cup decanter style), microwave, flat screen tv with hundreds of channels, USA Today, and complimentary internet. Our "balcony" was not so great: 2 mismatched chairs on a tiny ledge with a very distant view of ocean above the building roofs of town. There was no complimentary breakfast (despite our Platinum IHG status), one drawback when compared to the nearby Holiday Inn Express.

Summary Heading: Paid extra for "Ocean View," Got a view of a dumpster and the hallway!
Summary: I'll start with the positives: clean room within walking distance to downtown. HOWEVER, we paid over $200 / night for an "ocean view with a private balcony" and instead - more than half of our balcony was obstructed by a cement wall and where we COULD see out, we were eye-level with a DUMPSTER and the hotel parking lot (the ocean, i think, was somewhere off in the distance a mile away and behind the entire city). One wall of our balcony was a window facing directly into the hotel hallway and we had several different guests looking in on us like we were in a fishbowl. We asked to be moved the second we were admitted to our room (ONE HOUR AFTER "CHECK-IN TIME") and they said they were all sold out and couldn't move us nor offer us any kind of discount for our stay or for future
Manager Response: Dear Eric F,  Thank you for providing us with a very considerate review and for staying with us. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. It is regrettable we fell short of your expectations this particular day. Please be assured that all comments are acted upon and used to improve the products and service we provide to our guests.  While we understand that your stay was not 100% satisfactory, we would hope that you would give us another chance to make your stay as best as it can be.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a friends wedding.  She arrived before me and found that the room hadn't been fully cleaned.  She mentioned this to the front desk who promptly said it would be taken care of and adjusted the daily rate of the room for that night.  I spent a majority of my time in the room while my wife did wedding things.  The hotel's location to area restaurants and activities was ideal (lazy man's translation "not far").  When we were packing to leave, we came across an issue that we brought to the attention of the gentleman at the front desk.  We received a followup call from the manager a couple days later.  The way the gentleman at the front desk and the manager handled the issue were above and beyond our expectations.  I can't think of a reason to stay at

Summary Heading: One trick pony: this room "Has It All."
Summary: And by all, we mean an awesome jacuzzi bathtub for two and an ocean view balcony; a fridge and flat screen TV - not that we turned it on even once! Mirrors everywhere made it much more fun to watch ourselves in this pet friendly establishment. We look forward to establishing a corporate account with the manager Todd, since everyone at the front desk was super helpful, from Shane who first booked our stay to Austin who adjusted it; Edgar who checked us in and Sheila who helped us leave, only wanting to come back as soon as possible for more!!!

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay---great time had by all!!!
Summary: My daughter was getting married April 14th. I needed to book 5 rooms for family and friends who would be staying for 5 days. This was the place!!! Everyone had a wonderful time during their stay at this hotel. The rooms were beautiful , large and quiet. My family members loved to sit on their balconies and enjoy the sun and the  views of this lovely beach town resort. And we can not say enough about the staff, they were friendly, competent and accommodating....recommending restaurants, places to see  etc....making our stay so much more enjoyable!  We were with in walking distance of all of the wonderful restaurants and sights in beautiful downtown San Clemente. Parking was convenient and free.  I would recommend this hotel without any  reservation!!!!!

My boyfriend and I stayed here while visiting a friend in San Clemente over Memorial Day weekend.  The outside of the building is quite pretty, in keeping with the Spanish style of San Clemente.  The woman at the front desk when we checked in (I wish I could remember her name; she had an accent) was very nice and upgraded us to a room on the front side of the hotel, which was great because that side has an ocean view instead of a freeway view.  Our room had a spa tub in it, which we didn't actually use, but I was suprised to see at a Holiday Inn.  The room otherwise could have perhaps used a little updating, but it was clean and comfortable.  I would definitely stay here again, though based on other reviews would request a front room.

Summary Heading: Located right next to the freeway
Summary: The hotel itself is your typical Holiday Inn, pretty standard and on the older side. However, this one is located right next to a major freeway. Our room was facing the freeway and was so close that literally people driving on the freeway could probably look into our window and see me standing there. It was extremely noisy even at night and you could hear every single car or truck passing by. I didn't sleep at all and I consider myself to be able to sleep almost anywhere. I requested a room change for our second night there and was told there were only two rooms left on the "ocean view" side and it would be a $200 per night "upgrade"! At a Holiday Inn? Apparently all the rooms were either freeway facing or "ocean view" facing even though I did not see any differentiation on the
Manager Response: Dear rlgirl61,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay.  It is unfortunate the noise levels at the hotel prevented you from fully enjoying your visit.  We are confident the necessary adjustments will be made, in order to achieve complete guest satisfaction.   Thank you again for your comments, we look forward to serving you in the future.   Sincerely,  Ben J Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: I was put up in this hotel for a work visit to San Clemente.  Typically, I will arrive a day early to enjoy being near the beach.  Upon research, I found that this hotel was not near the beach and decided not to go early.  I was thankful.  The hotel is clean, the men working the front desk are friendly (but slow), there is coffee and tea available in the morning and it is a relatively easy walk to the "main drag" in San Clemente if you are fit.  I would not go here for a vacation nor to visit the beach.  I was very luckily upgraded to a corner suite with an in room tub.  I recommend this if you are going for a personal trip.  It had a small sink, micro, fridge and counter that made it homey.  Overall, it was average for business and I would not recommend it for a
Manager Response: Dear DOCJAE,  Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. Please accept my sincere apology for the shortcomings you experienced during your stay and we regret our hotel did not live up to your expectations. We take all comments into consideration and welcome any opportunity to improve.   If there is anything we could do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to let us know.  Sincerely,  Joel B Case Manager IHGCare

Summary Heading: Good hotel, but the parking situation sucks!
Summary: we recently stayed here&the staff was great...rooms were big&nice BUT the parking is horrible. The owner has at least 15-20 old beat up cars in garage below not giving the guests room to park, we got back a little late&managed to find one spot and barely fit. Why the owner has all his junk cars there in not understandable. One of the staff agreed and said they mentioned it before but no changes have been made. we would return if the owner made room for gust parking as opposed to his own personal garage.

We have been coming to this Holiday Inn for two years now and plan to keep it a tradition. We hope to make it back more often. The location to the beach and pier is very convenient. The rooms are clean, cozy and aesthetic. The staff is courteous and professional. Todd and Troy definitely make you feel welcome. The very attentive service at the restaraunt was great, too bad we missed the seasonal bar, but there's next time.

I can not express enough how wonderful the staff is at this hotel.. For the past 12yrs I have been making a stop in San Clemente before heading to San Diego to visit my daughter...Not only is this hotel spotless the staff is amazing... If I may I want to compliment Todd Forester the General Manager for his outstanding service, he makes you feel like family.  Shane Wilkinson  as well.  I only come once or twice a year but they remember me every time.

Summary Heading: WOW!   Felt like a boutique hotel room!
Summary: My wife and I had heard a lot of great things about San Clemente so we went for an overnight get away.  OK....the room was huge and spotless, had a fantastic King Size bed with high quality linen and a MASSIVE Jacuzzi bath tub with mirrors next to the bed!!!  (Yes, this really is a Holiday Inn)  It also had a wrap around balcony with ocean view.  We could easily walk to all the excellent restaurants, stores and bars.  The staff was fantastic--everybody we encountered smiled and went out of their way to take good really care of us.  I would stay here again in a heart beat and recommend to all my friends.

As Long Beach locals we decided to come down for a quick overnight with our 16-month-old and really enjoyed ourselves. The hotel has convenient location and felt more like a beach-side resort than what I would typically consider a Holiday Inn to be. The staff was friendly and attentive (a brand new pack-and-play delivered to our room for the little one) and the room (a suite with jacuzzi tub and ocean view balcony) was wonderful--clean, modern and bright. The bed and linens were especially a treat. It was also nice to roll out of bed and head down to their little restaurant for breakfast. All in all a wonderful local getaway. We are already planning our next stay.

My family and I took advantage of a Groupon deal for 2 nights at the Holiday Inn. I think for the most part, this hotel does its job, meaning, do not expect a very fancy hotel. It is updated with newer amenities. It is very close to the freeway but that did not bother us at all. There was ample parking (underground). Laundry was also available via "honor system". It's not the coin operated type. There was one washing machine and dryer. There was a restaurant on site that offered Kids Eat Free (and since we have kids, that's a big plus for us)!!!  Overall, I would recommend this place if you're not one of those picky guests. We needed a place to sleep at night, and it was very clean. The staff was accomodating...can't complain!

Located right off the freeway a few blocks from the north side of downtown area with plenty of eateries & shops. The SC  pier is another 10-15 minute leisure walk further down.   Consider paying a little extra to receive the King Suite w/ jacuzzi on the view side w balcony. Keep in mind nearby are all commercial buildings & the ocean view is on the distance! If you get the even room #s you end up literally watching cars race on the 5 FWY like you are in a NASCAR speedway:) Nice for a few hours but not for overnight stays. The third floor is on the fwy level. The rooms do seem well insulated we on the view side didn't hear much of the FWY noise inside unless you get on the balcony. Not much use of balcony because this time of year you get the June gloom factor where it's overcast

Last week my husband and I spent two nights at the Holiday Inn in San Clemente.  It is an older hotel that has been completely redone with pleasing decor, good beds and bedding, microwave, refrigerator, flat screen TV and even a choice of firm or soft pillows.  The room was very clean, and there was a free bottle of water in the room and decent coffee for the coffeemaker.  One thing I liked was that the blackout curtain was one solid piece pulled from one side.  I always carry a couple of clothespins to close the usual gap in  the curtains that close in the middle.  The people at the desk were pleasant and helpful.  I got a great deal on Groupon so can't complain about much, but our room was billed as an "ocean view", and the view was actually some peaks at the ocean between

What a great place to stay in San Clemente.  We were lucky enough to stay in room 337 for 4 nights from 4/5 through 4/9.  We checked in around 9 pm, as our flight into LAX had landed at 7 pm.  The young man who checked us in was very nice and helpful.  When we got to our room, I was very impressed.  My husband is an Intercontenal Club member and we stay at lots of Holiday Inns.  This is, by far, the nicest Holiday Inn that we have been to.  The room was spacious and clean.  There was a little musty smell when we got there but it quickly disapated after we opened the balcony door.  The bathroom was very nice and looked recently redone.  The bed was a little hard for me, but it was fine.  The refrigerator and microwave really came in handy.  The next morning I opened the drapes

Summary Heading: Nice view, great rooms, and friendly staff!
Summary: Wonderful place to stay if you want to get away for a couple days. We had a great ocean view with a variety of great restaraunts nearby. Only a short walk from shopping district and other services. Although the carpet was a little dirty and the service was slow, comfy beds and a friendly staff awaited us. Overall, a nice place to stay.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in San Clemente
Summary: Everything was excellent, rooms were tidy, staff was friendly, great service in the restaurant! Great location to Del Mar for shopping and the pier...walking distance. Everything was really great and made for a nice stay.

My husband bought a Groupon at the last minute so we could get out of town for a few nights. We had a great stay. Ocean/sunset views, walking distance to shops and restaurants. Quite a pleasant little property. Our only complaint was a dirty hot tub and the pool isn't heated but we weren't there long enough for it to dampen our stay.

Summary Heading: Great Groupon Purchase. Will go back for sure!
Summary: We purchased a Groupon for this hotel and stayed there over Spring Break for 2 nights.  The staff was very kind.  The room was spacious, and very clean, newly renovated.  Bathroom sparkling clean.  Great small patio with ocean view (in distance). Great that each room has a nice sized small refrigerator and microwave.  Upon checking in, we learned of the $2.95 breakfast deals at the restaurant on site and hoped to go, but never did.  Great location as it is a very short walk to shops and GREAT restaurants (We love Nick's!).  Todd Forester, the General Manager was super kind and friendly. He made sure our stay was great.  And it was!  We will stay here again and again, as we love to surf in San Clemente and Dana Point.  Only draw back is that the air conditioning unit was an old

Just came back from a 2 night stay booked through a Groupon deal. Stayed in room 303 and when we first walked in room stunk. Opened sliding door and it seemed better after awhile so being that I was with 3 kids who were anxious to go out and explore I did not ask to change room. One of the kids in our group had a hard time falling to sleep because of the smell. Mentioned to the front desk the next morning and they did offer to move us but again since we were already unpacked and just 1 night left with kids raring to go we left out that day and asked them to look into it. We came back to a room that smelled from cleaning supplies and air freshener but that musty smell remained and we were again required to sleep with patio slider open.With a lot of outside noise from a bar one
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We appreciate all feedback as it allows us to make the corrections needed to keep our hotel the top rated hotel in San Clemente. We take great pride in delivering exceptional experience to all of our guests and feedback is a great tool to help us stay current on that promise. It is true that we are pet friendly and we do deep clean each room after a pet has visited. We have since done an additional deep clean as well as a shampoo of the carpet in room #303. We hope that you choose to give us another opportunity to become your hotel of choice, and appreciate you as a guest.

Summary Heading: Average, with many little complaints...but nice staff.
Summary: This Holiday Inn is in a great location, it's not ON the beach, as I pictured, it's a few blocks away but you can see the ocean. We purchased a two night Groupon that came with a jacuzzi suite. First, there is a whirlpool tub (in the middle of the room, it's odd) but its definitely NOT a suite. In fact, because it only comes with a king bed and there no rollaways or separate areas with a couch, my husband had to sleep on the floor while the kids and I slept on the bed. There was only ONE person working in the entire hotel the first night, so when our TV broke he had to leave the front desk to help us. He was VERY VERY nice though, and couldn't have been more accommodating.  There is NO FREE BREAKFAST, except that The kids eat free. There were too many little things to make us
Manager Response: Dear ElleWalters,  We appreciate that you took the time to review our hotel. It is our goal to consistently ensure our and services are superior and we are truly delighted the level of service you received from our staff lived up to your expectations. I am sorry you were not satisfied with the conditions of the room you received. While we understand that your stay was less than satisfactory, we thank you for sharing your feedback as this is our best resource for improving guest services. I hope that you would give us another chance to make your stay as best as it can be.  Sincerely,  Joel B Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: Bought this deal on Groupon. Went with my daughter for a girls weekend. What a nice hotel. Staff was so friendly and helpful. Clean, beautiful rooms.  Close to all. Restaurants within walking and so was boutique shopping. Beach was about 3/4 mile down street from all restaurants and shopping. Could walk everywhere. Nice location. Ocen view rooms were nice. I  read that the ones on the back side face the freeway so they would be noisier with freeway traffic. Our room was ocean view,  Dana point was just a 5 min. Drive away, but really a neat town to hang out it. Great hotel to stay at. Free parking and wifi too.

Ocean view from the third floor.  The room was clean and the staff was very helpful.  This hotel is walking distance to many places to eat and to shops. There is a nice refrigerator and a microwave in the room as well as a couch.  Ample room!  Great place will return again as soon as I possibly can.

Summary Heading: Courteous staff, rooms newly decorated and a view!
Summary: After living in San Clemente for many years, I returned for a visit. I was already familiar with the location of this Holiday Inn. I requested a 3rd floor with balcony and ocean view. I arrived quite late and was pleasantly surprised to find exactly what I had requested as well as a room that was clean and fresh ... remodeled just recently! The staff was more than helpful and courteous from beginning to end. Although you are a little bit of a walk to the beach .. the price of the room is very reasonable for ocean view and balcony. And you are walking distance to many great restaurants and San Clemente's downtown!!!! There was also a refrigerator and even a microwave in the room!! I could not have asked for a better stay!! And did I mention ... the weather was absolutely gorgeous

Very friendly staff, check in took only 5 minutes. the room was absolutely beautiful with a nice patio overlooking downtown San Clemente and the ocean. the Jacuzzi tub was definitely a plus, and the best part was that it was located in the corner of the room which allowed you to see the view from the tub. The room was very spacious and clean. The hotel was in a great location, right off the freeway and walking distance to the beach and the pier. An amazing experience overall, definitely recommend for anyone trying to get away for a few days.

Summary Heading: Excellent staff, rooms and all round good ambience
Summary: Having worked as a Tour Manager for a holiday company, where I stay is important to me and San Clemente Holiday Inn has in no way disappointed me. Our room had a wonderful ocean view, jacuzzi and very comfortable bed.  Nothing was too much trouble for the front of house Reception and everyone else employed here deserves a huge pat on the back .    This Holiday Inn is in a totally excellent position, has easy access to all local amenities, shops, transport, restaurants etc and above all the beautiful blue ocean.  Can't wait to visit again.

Summary Heading: Courteous, friendly, knowledgable hosts and hostesses.
Summary: Truly enjoyed the experience in a downtown, centrally located hotel.  Enjoyed the experience of the pier and the Fisherman's Restaurant.  Our breakfast was excellent at the hotel.  We cannot say enough about your employees.  Our stay was quiet and enjoyable.  The only problem we had or could complain about was the darn rain.

My wife and I were visiting the San Diego, CA area.  We had booked and had printed tickets to Disneyland prior to leaving our house in Winchester, VA.  We were three quarters of the way to Disneyland when we had discovered that we had left the entrance tickets at our home in Virginia.  We stopped at the Holiday Inn at 111 S. Ave de la Estrella and spoke to Mr. Todd Forester, General Manager, and asked him if he could go onto the internet and reprint our tickets.  Well, he took the time to help us, even though we were not stayibg there.  He spent over a half hour of his time, and saved our vacation.  The next time my wife and I visit California, we will make sure to stay at the Holiday Inn there.

Summary Heading: Friendly, Clean, Perfect San Clemente Ambience
Summary: We hold all of our Yoga for Surfers events at the Holiday Inn San Clemente, and love the attentive, friendly service we get from Todd and his staff. This is a family-owned hotel right in downtown San Clemente, just minutes from shops, cafes, restaurants and the pier/beach. We could hold our events anywhere in town but we always choose this Holiday Inn because we are welcomed like family. Our guests love the clean, fresh modern rooms; they are large, quiet and a perfect place to rest and recharge for all of the fun activities. We have had some of our attendees stay at other locations in town that they booked on their own, but once they saw the location, the amenities and experienced the overall vibe, they wished they had chosen the Holiday Inn. To let you know how much we like

Best thing is location, near freeway but easy walk to town, nice beach views (but not on beach).  Get an ocean view.  Hotel is a bit rundown.  Hot tub broke, tub would not plug, microwave missing turntable, squeaky doors, and first night alarm went off at midnight!  Room heater VERY loud.  Nice staff tried to apologize but they need better maintenance and upgrades.  Good breakfast but it's not included.  Pool not heated.  Fine if you want to be near town but not the most comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear GalInSeattle,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. I'm very sorry you were not satisfied with the condition of the hotel. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas. We welcome any opportunity to improve.   If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to ask the Manager on Duty.   Sincerely,  Ferdinand G Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: I travel a lot for work and spend about 50 nights on the road in some of the nicest hotels you will find.  This trip, however, was all about our travel baseball team of a group of 13 year olds and their families.  Everyone commented on how nice and comfortable the hotel was.  What was really impressive was the service from Todd and the rest of the staff who made you feel like you were staying at a five star resort.  We will definitely come back.

We weren't at the much because we were visiting family but as we were coming and going the staff was very friendly.  The room was very clean, nice and spacious, even had a mini fridge and microwave.  Room includes breakfast with real scrambled eggs.  Great location, great price!

A very clean and nice hotel with a great location. The staff was extremely proficient and kind in helping us in our move.                              We continually return to the restaurant for the good food and company even after our stay.

The weather has been gorgeous in southern California this fall and my boyfriend and I were hoping to stay somewhere close to the beach and reasonable. We found it at this Holiday Inn. It is walking distance to the Pier and many restaurants and bars. The hotel itself looked remodeled with artsy decor, warm vibrant colors and spacious accommodations. We will gladly return for another visit.

Our Baseball team was playing in a local tournament and we decided as a group to all stay together so the boys could relax and hang out together and swim in between games.  Todd the manager at the Holiday Inn was so accommodating!  He made sure we were all together on the same floor was great about early check in and even placed our order for pizza!  We will definitely stay there again!  Thank you Todd for some great memories!

I spent the month of August and half of September 2012 at this hotel. I was in the area working and my wife joined me for three weeks of this time. The hotel,staff,pool,restaurant and weather were all exceptional, and made our stay quite memorable. I especially want to thank Stephan and Katie for all of their help, it was always with a smile and over and above our expectation.  (even when a bimbo like me can't get the screen door open to the balcony). Until we meet again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience! We hope to see you really soon.

Summary: After a spur of the moment roadtrip, we were lucky to get one of the last rooms available during peak season. The friendly staff went out of their way to help us with check-in and sightseeing tips. The recently remodeled room was clean and esthetic. After a pleasant day at the beautiful beach, grownups enjoyed a drink at the cozy bar while kids had a snack at the restaurant. We endedup staying an extra day and will deinitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Glad to read that you were able to get one of our last room available, Weekend and holidays are always busy. Give us a call, even when you are allready on your way, and we will be happy to reserve the best room in San Clemente!

Summary: going back for sure!!  love my home away from home.  The staff and Todd, so lovely always, greet me and treat me so wonderful every single time I visit.  They sure got me spoiled.  Even on my short visits such as the last one, are wonderful get aways.  I know I will always feel welcome in this great hotel and the surrounding area as well.  I wish I could stay longer but I shall be back next summer again for my regular vacation.  Meanwhile, looking forward to another short get away in December.  I know what to expect from this wonderful and lovely staff and sometimes, it is a huge deal for such along with the great location and overall hotel conditions!!!   Thank you Todd!! thank you aaalllll !! you are great !!
Manager Response: I can tell you enjoyed your stay, come back soon and often!

Summary: Every summer we plan a family vacation and our first choice is always a stay at the Holiday Inn Express. Its walking distance to the beach, clubs and restaurants. We have been vacationing every summer at teh Holiday Inn. Their staff is the friendlist I have ever come across. The rooms are immaculate and very comfortable. They have all the amenities I need on a vacation. They have an excellent menu and bar. I highly recommend Holiday Inn as your hotel. Once you stay there, you will never wan to leave. This is what vacation is all about. We love it!
Manager Response: As you mentionned the Holiday Inn Express at the begening of your review, I would like to point that here we are Holiday Inn Resort, walking distance to the pier of San Clemente right by downtown. 949.361.3000.

Summary: We always love coming to SC and staying here. The staff is so friendly and very helpful. We ate at the restaurant every morning we were there for their awesome breakfast deal and even came back for their taco tuesday. The hotel is nice and clean and it's walking distance to beach, restaurants and shops. I love this place!

My wife and I recently stayed for a few nights for my birthday weekend. The staff was very helpful, room was nice with a great ocean view. The restaurant had great food and was reasonably priced. Definately coming back.

My wife and I stay here every year during the surf competition in Sep. We always have agreat time and this year was no different. The hotel sits right across the street from Downtown San Clemente, they have excellent food in the restaurant and an attentive staff to go with it.

To summarize, "EXCELLENT" From the Front Desk Check In and Out, the great On Site Management and Staff, to comfortable rooms and a location that affords walking access to all San Clemente has to offer, this Hotel will please.    Always my "To stay" location when in town

Great weekend at the Holiday Inn.  Last minute decision to escape inland heat wave and we were lucky to find a great room in San Clemente.  The room was large and looked like it had recently been redecorated. We lucked out when the manager upgraded our room and gave us an ocean view room.  The staff was very helpful and told us about what was available at the hotel and things to do close by.  We would definitely stay there again.

Summary Heading: I would stay again, not bad for a night or two.
Summary: The waiter at breakfast was the best. he was friendly, helpful and knew what was going on! The manager also helpful and made us feel welcome.   We got there in the evening and front desk staff didn't give us much info about the facilities - or our breakfast voucher (our breakfast was included) so there was confusion in the morning, which could have been avoided. The room was standard and comfortable (good mattress) we didn't hear the cars at all-despite being next to the freeway, seriously good hotel windows!  Overall a nice place to stay and handy for the downtown area, and only 15 mins walk to the pier. Good place for a stop-gap.

Constant companion and I spent several days here recently and found it to be an excellent 2 star property. We had a king jacuzzi suite which was clean and comfortable as was the rest of the hotel. The amenities that we expect in 3 star and above properties; valet parking, large, comfortable, well appointed lobby and common areas, etc are lacking hence the 2 star rating. It is very conveniently located right off I-5 but that does put you off the beach, beyond a normal walking distance. On the plus side, it is very close to many excellent restaurants and shops. If your needs are easy on/off for traveling and central 'business' location in a simple, clean facility this should suffice. If however you prefer a more upscale hotel, close to the beach, at a similar price point, you

Hotel Staff were great, location was close to shopping and the beach.Downtown San Clemente is a great place for shopping and dinning. Breakfast at the hotel was great and our server(IRAJ) was the best! Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you for this review,  Our restaurant is open for breakfast from 7.00 am to 10.00 am and also for diner from 5.00 pm to 11.00 pm. Make sure you ask Iraj about our breakfast special $2.95 ( Bacon or sausages, 2 eggs, potatoes, toast and coffee ) cooked when you order it! And don't forget to stop by at night and let Troy prepare one of his amazing cocktails.

Summary: Staff was excellent, the rooms were perfect for us and the restuarant was splendid! I highly recomend this place to families and business people alike! We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves here and will definitely be back!   p.s. make sure you ask about the free rentals for beach stuff & the weekday breakfast special! Those are key!  -Greg

Our visit got off on the wrong foot when we couldn't have a regular place to park in the a basement parking area because the owner stores 10+ cars there.  Unable to access the internet the first night didnt help either.  Reported the toilet in my room was running and they offered to fix it. Next night it was worse, noisy.  We were told that our breakfast in the morning would cost $2.95 (should have been free when you spend $180 to $200 a night) so imagine my surprise when we were charged $27. Brought this up to the staff later and was told it was our mistake, as much as to say, "suck it up."  there was loud music either in the building or nearby until 11:00 pm. I'll be staying elsewhere next time, and there will be a next time because of family in the area.
Manager Response: Sorry were stay at our property was not as good as for most of our Guest, as we can see on tripadvisor. As we are in a full service hotel, we don't allow ourselves to serve a preheated breakfast, however $2.95 for 2 strip of bacon or 2 sausage, 2 eggs, potatoes, toast and coffee is a pretty fair deal, especially knowing that Chef cook fresh food at your order only. Some of our booking option include a $20 voucher valid for breakfast which you can use to try one of our so many option in the menu.

Summary: The hotel is OK but not extraordinary. We did not book a beach view room, but were nevertheless rather surprised to have our room window directly at the level of freeway 5. It was simply impossible to open a window. If you stay there, take a beach view room. The rest was OK, clean and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, and thank you for mentioning that we offer this room type, which allow our Guest to save some money and still enjoy the location of our hotel right in downtown San Clemente. Non ocean view room are equiped with sound proof double window, Flat screen TV, mini fridge, microwave, pillow top mattress and high speed Wi-fi.

Summary: Good location to visit Marine son living in San Clemente but average building and very overpriced.  Can walk to shops and restaurants. Quick access to highway. Difficult parking minivan or suv. Small pool.  Front desk friendly and offered water bottles. Also gave beach chairs and towels to us for the day!
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, I am glad your were able to enjoy our complementary beach chairs and towel when you went to the beach.

Summary: No, this is not a beach front property or resort, but a really good quality traveler's hotel.  Like other guests, I had a very positive experience.  It's recently updated, clean, very quiet, in spite of its location next to highway 5, and the front desk staff was genuinely friendly and helpful.  The beds were super comfortable and I really like the extra pillows (your choice of soft or firm).  I also liked that it is located just one block from the downtown area where all the shops and restaurants are located.  Breakfast should be included for what they charge, but they do offer a $2.95 special during the week.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, as you said, our location downtown is nice, your can also enjoy our restaurant with a full bar and great happy hours from 5.00 pm to 7.00 pm.

Summary: It is a hotel.  Nice staff, clean facility, great parking, and a close walk to the beach.  Even though our hotel room was on the interstate, it was silent.  Very kind staff, and very close to all the sites of SoCal.  Coffee in the morning in the lobby.. which is a nice pick me up, before walking out for breakfast.  Easy.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, we are conviniently located half way beetween Los Angeles and San Diego.

Summary: OK, just so you aren‚Äôt disappointed when you check in‚Ä¶the ocean in the ‚Äúocean view‚Äù is about a mile away from the hotel. All you need to do is stumble out of the hotel and roll downhill to land in it, but be aware you won‚Äôt step outside the hotel onto sand.    That being said, this HI hotel is in a very convenient location to all the restaurants, bars, and shops in SC. It is at the south end of town, located right off I-5. It is about 25 minutes from the John Wayne Airport, and about an hour each from San Diego and LA airports. There is a Metrolink/Amtrack station at the north end, and one down at the pier, as well. This makes travel to San Diego, LA and all points in between fairly simple.   Hotel has been refreshed in a number of ways. The outside has been repainted, as have

I was there a few weeks ago for my brothers wedding and WOW what a great experience.  The staff and the GM were absolutely awesome and very accommodating to all of us.  It was probably one of the best hotel experiences that I have had.  Rooms were nice and clean.  They had a great sunday Brunch with a live band.  I will highly recommend this place to any of my friends and family and cannot wait to stay there again.  Its also in walking distance to alot of great resturants and a few miles from the beach!  A+++++++++
Manager Response: Thank you for this review,  the property is located 0.7 miles from San Clemente pier,  this is a nice walk by Avenida Del Mar.

Summary: Wow! 5 Beautiful days at San Clemente Holiday Inn!  I had heard about this place some time before and resisted booking for another hotel that I have used for years for vacation.  Well, I now have a new favorite Cali-Beach hangout.  Great hotel and staff, close to everything you could want and within walking distance to just about everything. Great restaurants/food and exquisite shops in the area.  Everything was perfect, only reason to use the car was to go sightseeing up the beautiful PCH-very nice areas/beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, come visit again really soon, we are all looking forward to it.

Summary: Loved my stay here is was one of the best experiences I have had at a hotel in along time.  The Manager and staff were so accomodating and worked their tails off to make sure we got an early check in and late check out.  They bent over backwards to make sure we were all happy the manager even ran upstairs when we forgot something in our room to get it for us as we were all dressed up to go to my son's wedding.  We had a great Sunday Brunch and the gentleman that puts that on was also so accomodating, I can't say enough about this Holiday Inn I will suggest it to friends and family and we will be back.  Thanks for all that you did to make our stay a pleasurable one.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, come visit again really soon, we are all looking forward to it.

Summary: Hi all.  Just stayed at the Holiday Innin San Clemente (the one near Presidio).  The location was nice.  A couple blocks from Del Mar street, a few blocks from our favorite restaraunt Sonny's, and a 15 minute walk to beach & pier.  Grand daughters had a nice time in pool & spa. Front desk clerk and manager treated us great.  We had two rooms for 4 adults and 2 children.  Manger upgraded one of our rooms for us so we could all watch fireworks.  Rooms are VERY clean.  Really enjoyed our stay and recommend to others coming to stay in San Clemente.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, come visit again really soon, we are all looking forward to it. I like to talk with Guest at check in, and I am ready to upgrade reservations when possible. Our goal is to create great memories.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a weekend with a large bridal party.  We rented several rooms and had SUCH a great time!!  The main manager is such a sweet man.  He treated are entire party extremely well.  The other staff had great customer service as well! Also, the bartender in the bar/restaurant is a great guy too!! The hotel is close to the beach and you can see the ocean from the balcony rooms.  It was one of the best hotel experiences I have had and that is saying something because we travel a lot! I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting San Clemente!  Oh, and on Sundays there is a great champagne breakfast with live music!! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, come visit again really soon, we are all looking forward to it.

Summary: What a great location. This hotel puts you within walking distance of the best San Clemente spots. The front desk was friendly and helpful and remembered our names throughout our stay. The ocean view is spectacular, overlooking San Clemente.  Beds are very comfortable and furniture is newer. Balcony was a treat. Restaurant was ok but just walk down the street to Antoine's for the best breakfast.  Covered parking was nice seeing as it was getting warm. Will definitely stay here the next time I'm in town.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, come visit again really soon, we are all looking forward to it.

Summary: The view here is incredible. I was stunned looking at the sunrise and sunset. The staff was friendly and the room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, come visit again really soon, we are all looking forward to it.

Summary: I had an excellent recent two-night stay at this particular Holiday Inn in San Clemente.  Not only were the rooms spotless, but the staff from the front desk to the hotel restaurant were tops.  Particularly, Edgar at the front desk was friendly and helpful in greeting me and checking me in.  The next morning I was greeted by Paul?? (who is French) at  the front desk and also very friendly and helpful.  My room was large, had a nice work desk, a sitting area, and flat panel TV.  The bathroom was spotless and bright with plenty of white linens.  The room also had a small refrigerator.  The room I was given on the third floor allowed me to see the ocean in the distance.  Although the beach is within walking distance from the hotel, it is close to 3/4 of a mile walk.  The only
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, come visit again really soon, we are all looking forward to it. By the way, Paul's name is actually Stephan :-)

Summary: We walked into the Holiday Inn in San Clemente late in the afternoon on a Monday without a reservation.  We were greeted by the front desk clerk as well as Todd, the hotel manager.  They acted sincerely pleased to have us stay there and make our stay a great experience.  Despite only having a few rooms that were not already booked, they set us up with a great room at a great price and made us feel very welcomed.  Throughout our stay we were treated to a helpful and enthusiastic staff who clearly understand the importance of great customer service and what it takes to run a successful business.  Todd and his staff obviously enjoy their jobs and their customers.  We will definitely stay at the Holiday Inn whenever we visit San Clemente in the future!

Summary Heading: Only place I will stay in San Clement!
Summary: It is very close to main street, walking distance. The rooms are clean & comfortable. We used the hot tub many times. There is a restaurant  on site which just opened up. They have a wonderful seating area out front which we all sat there thru-out the day. Very close to shopping & other eateries. This is our 2nd stay & I will return.  This hotel is very close to the San Mato entrance to Camp Pendleton, which is why we stay there. We had lots of down time & stayed at the hotel alot with family. We would just hang out in the front seating area, walk down to the shopping or pubs.

Summary Heading: You can tell when the staff cares about the property and its clientele
Summary: Todd, the GM for the HI San Clemente, was VERY engaged with pretty much every part of my stay. I traveled on business. The network connectivity for the room I was in was excellent as far as speed, but the WIFI signal wasn't strong. It didn't impact my usage, but I was concerned about whether or not my smaller devices (phone, tablet) were going to be able to connect with their smaller antennae. No worries.  Todd opened the restaurant last week. I had the pleasure of sitting at the bar and talking to him and some of his very interesting patrons last night, and let me tell you, I was very happy for the company. Todd seems genuinely thrilled to come to work. I don't know what sort of job a chain hotel GM is, but I can imagine its not very rewarding unless you get to know your

Being in the customer service world for over 16 years I don't typically write these because your lucky enough just to get good service. Holiday Inn has always been good but my last trip to San Clemente was that much better because of the front desk person by the name of Stephan Martin who went out of his way on a multitude of requests. His attitude and professionalism is top notch, I truly hope Holiday Inn takes time to recognize his skills and not let him work for another company!!

I had to make a last minute business trip to San Clemente.  When I say last minute, i called at 4:30pm and arrived at 7:pm.  I was told that I got the last room.  My first thought was - it will be the worst room in the hotel on the freeway side.  When I checked in, I was greeted with my name and notified that my ocean facing room with a king size bed was waiting.  Wow.  The room was clean and while it has an ocean view, the hotel is not right on the water.  The main business district is a block a way with a variety of restaurants.  The continental breakfast was typical fare - muffins, cereal, OJ. nothing real special.  My plan was for only for one night. The morning I was originally planning to leave, I asked for an additional night as my work plans changed.   Without

Summary Heading: Clean, Great location, Very friendly staff.
Summary: Clean and spacious room equipped with Queen size bed, coffee table, sofa, balcony and LCD TV. Full size bathroom. Very comfortable room for 2 people. Ocean view is worth it. Nothing particular with the hotel itself, nice lobby, elevator, restaurant. Location is great, very close to main street, Avenida Del Mar, and less then 10 mns walking distance from the beach (front desk provides beach towels). The San Diego freeway is nearby which we found out to be a great thing to drive out to Dana Point and Laguna Beach. Last but not least, the staff at the front desk and restaurant was extremely friendly and helpful.
We had an awesome room which was spotless, LCD TV, Jacuzzi and an ocean view.  The staff was incredible.  Make sure you check out the resturant

Just an okay stay - the rooms were very clean, which is our number one criteria.  Holiday Inn website mentions a "complimentary breakfast."  When we asked about this they had no idea what we were talking about, but later gave us a coupon for $20 off a breakfast in their breakfast-only restaurant.  Holiday Inn website mentions that kids eat free at Maxims, their breakfast, lunch and dinner restaurant.  As mentioned above, it's only open for breakfast.  When we mentioned "kids eat free" to someone at the front desk they said that this wasn't their policy.  A second staff member later confirmed that kids eat free.  We did book an ocean view room and did get an okay view of the ocean; just realize that you are at least one mile or more from the ocean, so it's not as if their

Summary Heading: Close to Laguna Beach, clean, friendly, comfortable!
Summary: My father, fiancee and me stayed for one night on the way to San Diego at the HOliday Inn San Clemente. I was not familiar with this neighborhood, so I choose this hotel upon the reviews I read on tripadvisor, hotel.com and yelp.  It was a great stay. I was not disappointed. The room felt spacious enough for the three of us and everything including the bathroom were updated and clean.  The staff was extremely friendly at the check in and I didn't hear any other guests. So it was quiet and nice. The free wireless was helpful for our ipad to connect with as well.  Overall it was a great stay. Would come again.

Summary Heading: Best value & experience in San Clemente
Summary: For the price and value, this was a perfect stay in San Clemente!  We were treated fantastically by the staff- who are friendly and quick to help out any way they can.  Don't get me wrong, this is not the nicest or newest hotel, but for the area this is a resort compared to 95% of the other options close by!  We loved our stay there and would give it 4 stars, but being treated kindly and with attention to serve by the staff added the extra star.

Summary Heading: Great value, walking distance to beach! Camp Pendleton close, family friendly.
Summary: Booked this hotel while attending Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach. It's clean, comfortable, freeway close and a great value. As a bonus you can quickly walk downtown for restaurants and shopping in funky beach-town shops.  A couple of blocks more and you are at the beach!  My only caution is that the underground parking lot is VERY tight, if you drive a truck or large car, skip it and park at street level.  Nice staff! Gave us water on arrival and were helpful with maps, etc.

Summary Heading: Cozy, clean, classy - H.I. San Clemente
Summary: We were visiting our son in this sweet little city of San Clemente and found it to be very comfortable and pleasant.  It was a bit farther from our son's home than some other local hotels, but after having stayed at another establishment closer to him that we were not as happy with, the quality more than made up for the distance.  The hotel staff was gracious and accomodating, the public areas very well maintained especially as this is an older hotel that could have been left to decline . . . but rather they have preserved the physical property as well as the essence of old-time customer service (increasingly rare, sadly).    Little extras like fresh fruit at the reception desk, fine dining at the hotel restaurant, and always pleasant attitudes from all the staff make this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel.  As you mentionned, we are all dedicated to deliver the best Guest service and help you to enjoy the best of San Clemente named by locals "the spanish village by the sea" Our night shift still host the Guest apreciation night on Tuesday and Thursday each Guest get 2 complementary drinks from 5.30pm to 7.00pm. We recentely updated our room with new nicely design desk chair and  more update are on the way.

Summary: My son is stationed at Camp Pendleton I tried to find something nearby. But did I ever luck out or should I say I hit the JACKPOT. The entire staff was nothing but very polite and friendly. The rooms were very clean and up to date. The location was walking distance to  many local shops and some really great restaurants and within 10 minutes of Camp Pendleton. I met some amazing people staying there and recommend it highly. What I liked the least was having to leave.

Freeway access was great, since this was a work trip. For vacation, there are places closer to the ocean. Walking distance from great shops and places to eat.   The room was spacious and had lots of working area, not just room for me to walk around the bed. I liked having a useable desk and sofa, and the patio was equally nice - but offered little privacy.   One bight the neighbor turned out to be a couple boys getting drunk and loud, but it was soon quieted - so I give good marks for the management.   I didn't use the pool, but it looked ok, nothing special. I will be back to this place, and I'm happy my job will send me back to Cali again soon!

The Holiday inn at San Clemente is like home away from home. The facility ivery clean. Todd the manager does mange the hotel very well. The staff do a wonderful job meeting all your needs.We have been going there x 3 yrs and look forward to getting out of the Az heat for a week. They have added a event, each evening they have a BBQ/Drinks. Its a nice touch. Thank byou Todd and staff for an enjoyable stay as always.

This hotel is backed up to I-5 and we were worried about the noise when we first saw it.  Didn't hear a thing outside, has great insulation but were on the West side of the building in a jacuzzi room.  I don't know if it makes any difference if you were on the back side.  All the employees were exceptionally nice and helpful.  Hotel was very clean and had a refrigerato and a microwave.

My wife and I have stayed in San Clemente many times in my in-law's condo and had stayed several times in the Holiday Inn Express on the north side of the city when our family needed additional lodging for famiy members. We just stayed at the Holiday Inn in downtown San Clemente for the first time this week and were very pleased with the hotel which has an excellent location next to Avenida Del Mar which is the main street in the city. The staff was friendly and professional, especially the General Manager, Todd Forrester, who noticed that I was double-booked with the Holiday Inn and hotels.com. He called me and helped me resolve this matter before I may of been charged double for the first night of my stay. He was very courteous and called me again to confirm that I had

Chose this hotel to be close to Pizza Port... a world-class brew pub with great pizza. That worked out well, and the hotel is close to Avenida Del Mar, which has lots of other restaurants and beach access. The hotel was adequate, but the room had an odd smell. So, if that sort of thing bothers you look for another place to stay. I found it tolerable this time... but next time I'll look for something else close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I am sorry and disapointed to read that we haven't been able to make your stay completely enjoyable. I asked our Housekeeping manager to investigate on the cause of this. I would like to take this opportunity to mention that we are starting the last part of our remodeling, and we are curentely receiving new in room furniture which is going to get instelled with new carpet, wallpaper and total bathroom remodeling.

Summary: Stayed here again and was impressed with new decor in lobby. Staff was as great as ever and my friend and I had a very lovely breakfast during our stay.  Room was clean, well appointed and very comfortable. I don't know how you get hotel bed sheets/pillows so soft that you feel like your "sleeping on a cloud ".  This is a great location. Convenient to shops, restaurants and beach & pier.  I didn't have to move my car once during my stay. Walked everywhere and enjoyed every minute. Will always stay here when I'm in the area. Thanks again to Todd Forester (GM) and his wonderful staff.

Summary Heading: Return visit same great stay from a year ago
Summary: I stayed at this Hotel a year ago and was exceptionally pleased that this year was just as enjoyable.  I was greeted and served by the same personable staff at the front desk and in the restaurant where  I enjoyed a delicious breakfast prepared exactly as ordered and my room was cleaned with new towels each day that as soon as I returned to room. This says a lot for the management in there hasn't been any change in the staffing.  This particular Hotel is so convenient to all the unique shops of San Clemente and best of all walking distance to beach and restaurants that I didn't need my car at all.

Summary Heading: WE LOVED IT AND WILL BE BACK
Summary: We have stayed here before . This hotel has always performed above avgTHE STAFF IS VERY FRIENDLY. This hotel is perfect for our vacation needs

Summary Heading: Quaint hotel with great front desk service
Summary: I arrived late afternoon after a cross country trex and about 10 hrs of traveling.  I was a little disppointed to find the hotel adjacent to Interstate 5.  I was told my room was not on the Ocean side but they upgraded me at no additional cost when I told them I was a light sleeper.  When I say Ocean side it's an Ocean view above rooftops.  The Pacific is still about 6 blocks away.  The hotel is nothing super fancy but it is very comfortable and I travel a lot so you can trust me on this.  It is centrally located within walking distance to many restaurants, shops and bars.  I'm very active so walking to the beach was not an issue for me but most would prefer to take their cars down to the Ocean/Pier in San Clemente.  They have a small gym that consists of two cross trainers and
Great staff and hotel. They really take teh time to see that your needs are met. Very clean and comfortable beds!

Summary Heading: Great choice, great location, great staff
Summary: Comfortable rooms, wonderful staff, walkable to the beach, walking back is kind of long and uphill, but if you stop and shop at some of the wonderful shops along the way like we did, it's not so bad.

I have been very satisfied with this hotel, the staff, and accomodations. Your staff has gone above and beyond expectations to make sure we are taken care of. One example is, while we were sitting outside on the patio, your day staff came out 2 different times and brought bottled water to us.  Never have i had that happen to us. I will definitely be coming back to this hotel and staying here, and i will be recommending this hotel to everyone that comes to this area.

I was lucky to receive an oceanside view.  Overall, this hotel has the amenities of a hotel but the feel of a good motel, which basically means it's not crowded, and you're not overwhelmed.  It's located at an exit right off the 5 freeway, so getting there and leaving is a breeze.  it's also located right in the fun part of san clemente, so restaurants and bars are all within walking distance.  the rooms are clean, well kept, and comfortable.  if there was anything to ding the hotel with, it would be its slightly aging items, such as the doors or some of the basic furniture.  However, they are well kept and only noticeable as an afterthought.  I would stay here again if in San Clemente!

We had a fabulous time and we could not be happier with our choice of the Holiday Inn.   We wanted to spend a couple of days in San Clemente to relax, walk around the town and shop. Our room (with a jacuzzi) was on the 3rd floor overlooking the pool area and and we also had an ocean view. The room was immaculate and all the staff were very helpful and pleasant. The Manager, Todd Forrester, greeted us with a warm, friendly smile. He recommended a  few restaurants to go to for happy hour, and told us about a couple of shops that we might find interesting. The brealfast at the Holiday Inn was delicious, (their french toast is the best we had ever had). A family member recommended the Holiday Inn and told us we wouldn't be disappointed. They were right!!!!

On the road for years commercially and always thought Holiay Inn was a good value.   I have changed my mind after staying at this hotel.   Adequate close parking, great views and really friendly staff, everybody obviously likes working there.  I liked being able to walk to the great cafes,  coffee shops and bars staying out of my car.

The room was ok, but it was suppose to have a microwave and did not.  Saturday night there was a reception at the restaurant and there was no parking.  The closest parking was a block and a half away and it was only 3 hour parking. The stalls are very poorly lined so if you have a big car you can only park in a middle stall. The side stalls are too close to pillars. They also appear to rent out spaces in their garage to locals. Lots of covered cars. No room for guests. Luckily the front desk clerk moved her car so we could park in her space. Then, we were kept awake by someone walking around above us. They weren't jumping, you could just hear every step they took.  They also had the TV on and you could hear the bass until 3:00 am.  The worst was when we got home and my daughter
Manager Response: We do not rent parking spot to locals, the fact is we do have Guest staying as long as a few month at the time, and because the hotel is located right in downtown San Clemente none of our Guest really have to drive to enjoy the city. I am glad that one of our dedicated employee have been able to make an extra spot available to have you more confortable parking.  All of our housekeepers are well trained to return immediately any lost and found items.

Summary Heading: outstanding service and really nice hotel
Summary: We can definitely confirm all the positive reviews. Upon arrival we received a warm welcome and Todd (the manager) kindly gave us a free upgrade to a wonderful ocean view room with jacuzzi, kitchenette and all amenities one could wish for in a hotel. He provided us with useful information about San Clemente (charming downtown area within walking distance) and recommended some really good restaurants. We had a wonderful time and enjoyed our stay at this nice hotel with outstanding service from all the staff.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay.  At The Holiday Inn San Clemente Camp Pendleton we strive to always give our guests the best service we can offer and are delighted with such a nice review.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: a little gem on the side of the ocean
Summary: rooms are great, a beautiful view of the ocean. staff and management were world class and there breakfast was out of this world night life is great all best bars in town along with the best food around, are just across the street . diffidently going back thanks

Summary Heading: right in the middle the fun
Summary: had a great stay this place is walking distance to everything san clemante has to offer

Summary Heading: Great value with super friendly staff.  Way exceeded my expectations for the price.
