Summary: Super staff, great room for price.  I paid 75.00 per night all taxes included on priceline and they upgraded me to 3rd floor king with ocean view.  There is free parking, free wifi, free cookies in lobby.  This is a well run hotel in a super location.  Would stay here again and as an airline pilot I stay at lots of hotels so I have a bit of experience with this.

Summary Heading: The nicest employees, managers, front desk and room service personel
Summary: After being an avid traveler, my husband can positively state that The Holiday Inn in San Clement (not the Express) was one of the nicest experiences we've had a hotel in quite some time.   The staff treats you w/the utmost respect.  Todd, the manager was so accommodating and thoughtful.  He really bent over backwards to make our one little one night get-way a delightful stay (away from our kids).    The front desk people and every other Holiday Inn personnel we were in contact with made our stay so enjoyable.  The room was very nice and it had been all redone with new floors and carpet, paint and furniture.  The bed itself was very comfortable and the bedding was really pretty.  We had a in-room jacuzzi tub and a view of the Pacific Ocean.    We will definitely be going back

This was my first time staying at the Holiday Inn SC. The staff was wonderful and the location is perfect. Right in downtown I walked to dinner every night. This hotel will be my hotel of choice every time I come to San Clemente.

My family and I recently spent a long weekend here.  I had pricelined the room for 5 nights and while I admit I was a bit skeptical of all the glowing single contributer reviews on this place, I found them to be spot on.  Staff - Everyone we encountered was sincere in their interest in making your stay a good one.  No matter their role at the hotel, they were always helpful and pleasant.  I was most impressed by this - it seems most places have completely forgot what good service is.  These folks excel at it.  Room - Our room was a double queen room with a sofa bed, facing the freeway.  The room was very clean.  It included a refridgerator, which was nice.  The double-paned windows made the proximity to the freeway almost negligible.  Our room was on the northern end of the
Manager Response: Thank you for this kind review, I am sure those information will be helpfull to Tripadvisor users.

Summary: What makes this hotel great is the service of the employees.  Friendly and helpful everyday.  Thanks.
Manager Response: Thank you for this comment, not only it help Tripadvisor users, it is also a nice reward to us.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Facility with staff that treats the guest as a VIP
Summary: The only thing that I can say that I don't like about this hotel is that I have to check out at some point.  The Holiday Inn in San Clemente at 111 S. Avenue De Estrella is a beautiful facility with upscale amenities.  The rooms are spacious and clean and the location is superb.  The front desk staff welcome you upon arrival with warmth and friendliness.  If you are traveling on business and have the good fortune to stay at this hotel, you will feel as though you are on vacation.  The best part of staying there is the rates are extremely reasonable.  Parking is ample and restaurants are just a block away in the charming downtown center of San Clemente.  Look no further than the Holiday Inn in Downtown San Clemente
Manager Response: Such a kind review is the best reward we can get for working on making our Guest as confortable as possible. Thank you very much,  We are looking forward to welcoming you again.

Summary: This little hotel is so cute and perfect for a weekend away with your spouse.  We walked down to a restaurant that the staff recommended.  It was perfect.  The food was good, and the atmosphere was great.  We walked all up and down the little strip of shops and down by the pier.  It was such a beautiful time.  We ate breakfast in the hotel restaurant the next morning, and that was very good also.  This is our second time at this hotel, and I would definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review on our hotel. As you mentioned this is the perfect location for a weekend days gateway, as for an extended stay, since we offer Guest laundry facilities, complementary WiFi in every room, fitness room, and complementary underground garage. I hope to see you again as soon as possible.

Summary: I stayed at this property over Christmas weekend so while I will make comments about the staff, I think it's important to keep in mind that they were working during a time when most of us are enjoying time off. While Holiday Inn is working to improve the image of their hotels, this property does nothing to help make it seem like anything more than the old Holiay Inn's.  The saving grace is it's location at the beach which, if you're staying there, I'm hoping you're spending more time away from the hotel.  Besides it's location, the only noteworthy upgrade is the shampoo and conditioner are Bath and Body works which my girlfriend really enjoyed when I brought them home. As for the rest, well, my room smelled like an old ladies that might have smoked and maybe had a cat (it was a
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. All comments received give us the opportunity to improve on our quality of service. We are glad you enjoyed the location and we hope to see you again in the future. On Tuesdays and Thursdays we offer a guest appreciation night. During this time we offer our guests free drinks in the lobby of the hotel. This gives us the opportunity to get to know our guests.

Summary: My stay included my sister & brother-in-law (visiting from Florida). Our rooms (suites) were large, nicely appointed and very clean & comfortable. No amenity was overlooked. My brother-in-law got his first view of the Pacific ocean from our balconies just as the sun was setting (and what a beautiful sunset it was!) All the restaurants and shops we visited were an easy (and enjoyable) walk from the Inn. The staff was well trained and informed and couldn't have made our stay any more enjoyable. Todd Forester, General Manger, was especially courteous and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are always so glad to know that our Guest have such a good time in San Clemente.  The location of the hotel building uphill downtown offers you a great spot for watching the sunset from your private balcony before going for diner.

Summary: We stayed at the Holiday Inn San Clemente for about 6 days.  It was a beautiful hotel in a beautiful location - close enough to the beach to walk, and close to alot of cute shops and restaurants.  There was free parking under the hotel, which was very convenient.  Since we were there for 6 days with our 2 young children, we availed ourselves of the laundry facilities, which were clean and well-stocked.  We also enjoyed the open air patio for eating or letting our small kids run and play for a bit.
Manager Response: Your opinion is really important to us, and to our future Guest. We are proud to offer complementary parking for Guest, San Clemente is so walkable that you might forget your car! Being located on this quiet street of downtown San Clemente, alow us to maintain this peacefull atmosphere that you and your familly enjoyed, we want you to feel like Home with the laundry facilities, gym, Wi-Fi, pool, to make your stay better than anywhere else.  Check our off-season rate allready open and visit us soon.

Summary: Downtown San Clemente,  Ideal location, it's close to restaurants and shopping area,  The hotel itself is clean, rooms are standard, nothing extra but it is all you need when you travel. Staff is really friendly and helpful, especially the manager (French I guess) who gave us a good tip on local attraction.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel, be back soon, there is always something new going on here!

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in a great location!
Summary: The location of this hotel was perfect! The management (Todd Forester) directed us on sites to see and recommened resturants for dining. The hotel was very clean and the staff was extremely friendly. Our room was beautiful and very romantic. Our stay was deffinitely a pleasant one. I would highly recommend anyone looking to stay in the San Clemente area to look into this lovely hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our Hotel. San Clemente is a great place to stay for a few days to enjoy real southern California spirit, and stay longer to enjoy the central location and visit all those attraction between San Diego and Los Angeles. Our Staff is well aware of what is going on in and around San Clemente, so call us to book your next stay and we will provide you all those recommendation you need to make it great.

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at the Holiday Inn in San Clemente. My colleague and I had a wonderful room with a view of the ocean. The location is conveniently located off the 5 freeway and just a few blocks away from the ocean. I was so disappointed that we had to return to work early the next morning, for I really wanted to wander around the cute cute San Clemente neighborhood. There are so many cafes and shops within walking distance to the hotel. Our sleeping room was very clean, and the beds made for a perfect night of rest. The hotel staff was was extremely nice and accommodating. I would definitely recommend the hotel and look forward to visiting the location again.

Summary Heading: What an awesome small family atmosphere hotel, I will frequent this one
Summary: The hotel was perfect for San Clemente!! Friendly, clean, good food, but old school cool!!! Not a big resort, but just right!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comment on your Holiday Inn,  As you mentionned, our hotel is not a oversized location, matching San Clemente, beach city atmosphere. We offer, complimentary wifi, business center, 32" flat screen tv, off the I 5 Freeway, and right in downtown, just a short walk from the pier, you can also enjoy our swimming pool, jaccuzzi, and we bought 2 new eliptical and 1 bicycle for our gym.

Summary: Recently stayed here while attending my niece‚Äôs wedding.  The room was clean and well appointed.  The location of this motel is convenient to shopping, eating and the beach.  We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Your opinion is really important to us. Housekeeping team is really dedicated to keep your room clean, and there is always someone available to dress up the sofa bed on request, bring extra towel to our Guest or any other bathroom items like complimentary razor, shaving cream, comb, ect.....

Summary: The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful - in fact every staff person we met during our six night stay was very kind and helpful and made us, as out-of-state guests, feel very welcome. The hotel is beautiful and well kept. We enjoyed the pool and also walked to the beach a number of times. The hotel will even check out beach chairs you can take to the beach with you at no charge. Parking is free and convenient at the hotel. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: What wonderfull pictures you posted here!  Thank you very much, I would like to take this opportunity to remind that we have BBQ available on request for the swimming pool area.

Summary Heading: Wonderful location in a beautiful area!
Summary: We enjoyed our week's stay for our son's wedding.  The room was spacious and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  Pool area was clean and well maintained.  The location was great!  Very walkable distance to the beach and other attractions.  Would love to stay there again.
Manager Response: Come back soon! Wedding day is a major event! we love to see family getting together at our hotel!  refrigerator in every room, microwave, coffee maker, and free wireless internet access are part of our effort to make your stay more convinient. Contact us and request about our weekly rate.

Summary Heading: The location was perfect for where we needed to be.
Summary: Any questions we had the staff was more than happy to help us.  It was also fun to be close to some cute shops which we also enjoyed.
Manager Response: Your opinion is really important to us. We do our best to be always aware of what is going on in town and what are the best things to do, and we like to share it. Our front desk time is available at anytime to answer your request, and the business center offer you access to your favorite website even if you didn't bring your laptop. I am glad you enjoyed your stay, contact us and ask about our winter season rate, even if it is never really winter in southern california.

Summary: We had a wedding in San Clemente and had a lot of family staying there. The hotel was amazing.  The staff so friendly and helpful.  I would highly recommend this hotel.  If you want a Southern California experience this is the place to go.  Your close to everything.  They also have chairs and towels for the beach that you can use at no cost which is really great if your flying in from somewhere else in the country.
Manager Response: As you said, offering beach chair and towel for the day at the ocean, it is a fantastic idea! We are listening to our Guest all the time, so contact us with any new idea. We also have BBQ available on request at the pool area.

Summary: wonderful staff, wonderful location, wonderful service, wwwonnndddeeerrrfffuuull stay.  It's not very often you get it all in one package.  My family and I were very impressed with everything especially the wonderful staff.  We were greeted with such pleasant attitudes and was mostly impressed by the managers wonderful spirits and professional character.  All this sure made up for the uncertainty of this hotel being so close to the freeway.  We are very glad we stayed there and defenitely will be back.    Keep up whatever you are doing.  It is great work.  Thank you!!!

Summary Heading: Our most relaxing vacation in years.
Summary: I knew we were going to have a great relaxing vacation as soon as we walked in the lobby. Everyone was so friendly. We were sincerly greeted by every staff member we encountered. Their statements always included, "If there anything you need, let us know."  The weather was great so we walked almost everywhere.  We ate at many eateries that were within walking distance of the hotel but we enjoyed room service and the hotel restaurant. There was an in-room whirl pool tub that was truly relaxing before bedtime. The bed was so comfortable that we slept late every morning and had breakfast on the balcony looking at the Pacific Ocean. We are looking forward to returning again and again.

Summary Heading: Excellent three day stay great service at all levels
Summary: I was so impressed with this hotel and would highly reccommend it to anybody for business or leisure. The management is terrific and extremely accomodating, rooms were serviced to my satisfaction every morning, and so many restaurants and shopping within walking distance in the quaint city of San Clemente. And if you like the beach you can walk there too.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, your opinion is really important to us. I am glad you enjoyed our room service, Chef is cooking breakfast for our Guest from 7.00 am to 10.00 am every morning. Come again and enjoy a free glass of wine during our Guest appreciation night every Tuesday and Thursday night.

Summary: My husband & I stayed at this hotel for our anniversary in March. Service was great and the hotel was close to the pier and all things shopping. Will definitely come here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, your opinion is really important to us. The location of our hotel, in the lovely downtown San Clemente, so close to the pier, is absolutely the perfect combination for a romantic getaway.

Summary: My family (wife, daughter, and me) went to the Holiday Inn in San Clemente and had a wonderful time over our anniversary weekend.  It is located one block away from Del Mar street, which made it perfectly located to walk to the Arts & Crafts fair that happened to be going on that weekend.  Additionally, it's just under a mile to walk to the beach, which is a great stroll during sundown.  Lastly, I cannot comment enough on the hospitality of the staff at this Holiday Inn location.  They were wonderful and extremely accommodating.  Thank you Holiday Inn San Clemente for making my family feel welcome and adding to the great anniversary that my wife and I were able to have with our daughter.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, your opinion is really important to us. The location of our hotel, in the lovely downtown San Clemente, so close to the pier, is absolutely the perfect combination for a romantic getaway.

Summary Heading: Will definitely stay here again!  Highly Recommend!!!
Summary: Extremely pleasant staff.  We had an issue with our room and it was quickly taken care of.  The central location to downtown San Clemente is awesome.  They are pet-friendly.  We had our dog with us, Elvis, who is a 4-pound Yorkshire Terrier.  He was a hit, and everybody loved him, including the hotel staff.  The food in the restaurant (breakfast) was superb.  Katie was super at the front desk.  If you are looking for a very nice place in a great location, stay here.  Pick the ocean-side for less freeway noise as this site is right next to the 5 freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review, As you know, we are working everyday to make your stay the more pleasant we can, and give the best answers to your request at any time.

Summary: Have stayed twice (June 2007 and July 2010).  Both good experiences.  If you choose this hotel I recommend requesting a room on the ocean side.  This reduces freeway noise.  Easy walking distance to food, shopping, etc.  Nice beach short distance away.  Rooms are average and clean.  Location is ideal for beach, LA and San Diego day trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review, your opinion is really important to us. I am glad to read that all your stay here since 2007 have been good experience. As you mentioned our central location beetween San Diego and Los Angeles and our beach city downtown makes San Clemente a great place to be.

Summary: This is this noisiest hotel. Its located next to interstate 5 and you can hear all the cars on the highway all night. Very hard to sleep. The front desk forgot my wake-up call, maybe they thought I did not need it since the cars did not let me sleep. The room above my room (room 230) must be a the hotel laundry room because it seems like a clothes dryer was on all night and you could hear footsteps from 8pm until 8am. I was just waiting to see the roof dust fall down because of so much stomping and walking. Im actually writing this review while still in the room. The cost of the stay was not worth the stay. Very disappointing for a holiday inn express hotel.

This hotel is overrun with dogs...snarling and  barking in the elevator and hallways, unleasehed dogs on the patio. The guests whose dogs are causing all the trouble don't care and neither does the Holiday Inn staff.  It is unbelievable how noisy it is.  I'm checking out 2 days early to get away from it.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your response regarding your recent stay. Your feedback is very important to us and I can assure you that we will look into your concern.   We hope you choose us in the future for your stay in San Clemente.

Summary Heading: views of Pacific and surfers on beach
Summary: fantastic hotel near x way but private had a nice resturant good food every where you go yo got great views of the ocean and beaches
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. San Clemente is a wonderful city and we are happy you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Friendly Staff but needs updating......
Summary: Stayed one night visiting my son at Camp Pendleton. Checked in on a Saturday then asked about rate reductions for the Sunday and Monday as I was considering staying longer and the answer was the rate stays the same.  Not happy with that so I stayed just one night and found a better room at Hampton Inn for 30.00 less a night and free breakfast and cocktails/snacks/cookies in the evening. Rooms need updating. Old air conditioners which cycle on and off all night. It is a dog friendly hotel and hope the owners don't leave the dog alone as my upstairs neighbor did(at 11:30 at night)....dog barked for well over an hour before he stopped.  Footsteps can be heard over head so if you go stay on the top floor. Bathrooms are outdated with the loud exhaust fan hooked to the sink lights not
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. Our dedicated staff takes pride in providing a very comfortable experience. I am also happy to say that the Holiday Inn San Clemente has upgraded the following for your pleasure.  1. Sealy pillow top matresses 2. Flat screen televisions 3. New bedding 4. New carpet  We hope you visit us soon!!

Summary: Was here on business for a few days.  No serious complaints about the hotel.  I guess I had bad roomies upstairs because I could hear them bashing around, but that's not the fault of the hotel.  My hot water was pretty slow in coming (I believe a glacier may have melted waiting for it), but it did get there.   I got upgraded to an 'ocean view' room, but that's really a misnomer.  I could barely 'see' a small sliver of the ocean at the top of the horizon from the 2nd floor.  I'm sure at the 3rd floor you get a bigger sliver.   Other than that, the room was comfortable and convenient.  It's in a fantastic area, with El Camino Real just a block down, and then Del Mar is just 2 blocks, with some good bars and restaurants around.  The San Clemente Pier is just a brisk 10 minute walk,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience,  As you mentioned the hotel is located half mile, and uphill from the ocean which help to get a nice view, and this short walk to the peir is always nicely going thrue Del Mar street with all thos shop and restaurants, or Victoria street if you are in a hurry going to surf.

Summary Heading: No Problems Here - Actually, very nice
Summary: Holiday Inn, San Clemente, California.  Directly off the Freeway in the heart of town. Park for free outside and underground. Walk, shop and dine in this wonderful little town. Plenty of pubs,restaurants, and gift shops right nearby.   Our clean and adequate room had a jacuzzi ensuite.  We enjoyed sitting on the balcony at night overlooking the town. They claimed that the room had an "ocean view," which is a stretch, as it is certainly viewable, albeit it in the distance. Room was equipped with microwave, fridge and coffeepot. Bed, couch and chairs very comfortable. Average sized bathroom.  Nice outside pool area looked inviting - weather permitting.  Although the hearty could walk to the beach, we chose a quick 4 minute drive.  Great restaurant nearby, The Blue Danube. Very
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. I am glad that you had a great time here and I am sure that your well built review will be usefull, for Tripadvisor members.  I would like to mention that since you took those pictures we did many update to this Hotel, and room are different now.  Please visit us again, it will be a great oportunity for you to take new pictures, and of course enjoy San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Bad service, dirty rooms, noisy at night
Summary: I stayed at this hotel from the end of November through the first week of December. Pulling up to the hotel I was immediatly disaapointed in the outside appearance and the lobby did little to change my mind - but are old and dumpy lookiong. I checked into my room and when I walked into the bathroom, I found a large bug crawling around in my sink. The room was outdated and the carpet was disgusting. The bedspreads look dingy, the bed itself is hard, and the pillows go flat as soon as you lay down. My room was conveniently located right along the freeway so the traffic noise was unbearable when it came time for bed. If you have seen the recent reports of hotels not cleaning glasses properly, let me tell you that I did not see a single glass on the cleaning cart which can only lead
Manager Response: Your opinion is really important to us. I am sorry to read that, since I am the new Front office manager of this Hotel, I want you to beleive that I want each single Guest to receive the best service. I encourage you to visit us again.

Summary: Initially we were not going to book a room with this hotel because it is closer to the freeway than it is to the beach. We were already in town so we took advantage of checking out the local community and were impressed.   The hotel sits one street off of Camino Real, San Clemente's main thoroughfare. This means that you are close to everything San Clemente has to offer but far enough away that the sounds of the city don't keep you up at night.  The hotel is very clean and the rooms are big enough that you don't feel crowded. We got an executive king with a whirlpool tub. The bed is so big you won't be awaken by bumping into your respective others. The tub is actually a whirlpool tub and not just some bath with jets. It is huge and could fit 3 people (4 if you are daring).  The
Manager Response: Why say anything else? Thank you very much, we hope to see you really soon.

Summary: We had reservations about this as it was very cheap and was right next to the freeway but we loved it ! Hotel was good and clean and we had a sea view room which faced away from the freeway so we heard no noise at all. Air conditioning was broken in gym which rendered it unusable by day however. San Clemente is a great little town with a village feel and the beach is only about 15 mins walk from the hotel down the main street. Shops and restaurants (a great selection) are withing seconds walk from the hotel.

I highly recommend this hotel, it's convenient to the beach (about a one mile walk, but you can park free in town by the shops to cut down the distance), the staff is very friendly and go out of their way to be helpful without  being asked.  The hotel restaurant has good breakfast food, and room service is available.  I was very impressed with San Clemente, it's a hidden gem in southern California, I liked it better than Del Mar or La Jolla.  The Fisherman restaurant at the Pier has excellent food with reasonable lunch and wine prices.

My bf and I are currently staying in this hotel, and we just love it. Great location, downtown/shops just a couple of minutes walk away, great restaurants nearby. The staff is really nice. Our room is big, we have a bathtub, a large balcony with oceanview, and a view over the beautiful city. Free parking.. Yeah, we love it here. Don't wanna leave.  Los Angeles is about a 1 hour drive away, San Diego also about 1 hour. The Shops at Mission Viejo about 15 minutes drive: Macy's, Nordstrom, Saks, and a lot of great stores for the ultimate shopping spree.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recommendations. I understand that you didn't want to leave! For extanded stay, but not only, we offer laundry facilities with all new machines, in room mini fridge and microwave.

Summary: I stayed here for business in January 2007. The location is great - it's right off the highway, and it's close to the downtown San Clemente area (shops, restaurants) and the beach.  The lobby is nice, and the staff was nice. We were told we were upgraded to "beachview", but you can't really see any of the beach, as the hotel is probably about 1 mile from the beach and not tall enough to see over the other buildings! I'd hate to think what the non-beachview (highway view) is!  The rooms left something to be desired. The mattress was probably the most uncomfortable I've ever slept on. Luckily, I had plenty of pillows in my room, so I managed to sleep on a bed of the pillows. The bathroom was marble and very nice, and the shower head was great.  I don't think if I'd stay here
Manager Response: Your opinion is really important to us.  Since your last review, we have now new pillowtop mattresses, 32" Flat screen TV, free in room Wi-Fi. Is you liked the location, be back to enjoy those room updates.

Summary: I usually dont write reviews but I had to write something about this place because I'd like to thank everyone that made our stay so pleasant. Great place. Id recommend it anytime.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience, I hope that your great memories makes you stay with us again.

Summary: I stay at hotels approximately 70 nights/year.   This Holiday Inn is the worst of any.   A dead rat in the hallway. Rooms that are very noisy...the hotel is right on top of Highway 5.   I would encourage anyone to look at the Dana Point Marina Inn. Bill
Manager Response: Your opinion is really important to us, thank you for sharing your experience. I am really surprise and more than everything sorry to read this. A lot of changes here since 2006, I really encourage you to come again and try our freshly renovated hotel.
